( Just as a note: It was Iris who com-linked Liono, not Iron. Two different 
things. One's a bot and the other's a comp program, one has legs...one 
doesn't. Simple but an honest mistake.)

* Iris received the message from Liono and sighed to herself as she opened a 
channel to his second-in-command...*

" Tigerhawk, request permission to activate a laser-locater weapon located 
in the roof of the ship, it will (explains what it does, travils along the 
walls, targets only Preds signatures, yadda, yadda, yaddy.)

* Iris awaits Tigerhawks orders to activate the weapon.*

_________________________________________:):):):)______________

* Iron Raptor groled as she looked at the base then at the squirming 
Predacon laying on the ground (Mosquitor), she sighe3d adn shook her head.
She looked over at Teltoli but then saw a Predacon come from behind a 
boulder( BrightBlade ), she points to her and speaks...*

" Teltoli, if you aren't to busy ducking blasts could you take care of that 
Predacon for us?"

* Iron Raptor snarled then looked at Teltoli, she knew that the new bot was 
eager for battle and hopefully wouldn't let them down.
She nodded to her then spotted two bots off in the distance, she growled as 
she left the new bot to her orders and walked towards her targets( Scourge 
and Rage. )
It was time to really see what these Preds were made of!*
